    static void
    _drawTexturedTriangleImpl(BufferedImage texture, Vec3[] trigon, double[] u, double[] v)
    Implementation of the textured triangle rendering Splits the triangle into two triangles and draws them pixel column by pixel column The pixels along the columns are interpolated, and are assigned to the appropriate pixel in the framebuffer data

    • drawTexturedTriangle

      public static void drawTexturedTriangle(BufferedImage texture, Vec3[] trigon, double[] u, double[] v)
      Renders a textured triangle
      Parameters:
      texture - The texture to be rendered
      trigon - The vertices of the triangle
      u - X coordinates inside the texture
      v - Y coordinates inside the texture

    • _drawTexturedTriangleImpl

      public static void _drawTexturedTriangleImpl(BufferedImage texture, Vec3[] trigon, double[] u, double[] v)
      Implementation of the textured triangle rendering Splits the triangle into two triangles and draws them pixel column by pixel column The pixels along the columns are interpolated, and are assigned to the appropriate pixel in the framebuffer data
